titles.title: Renewable Energy Parity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax credit parity for electricity produced from renewable resources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/22/2011--Introduced. Renewable Energy Parity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate after 2012 the reduction in the rate of the tax credit for electricity produced from open-loop biomass, small irrigation power, landfill gas, trash combustion, and hydropower facilities (thus allowing the same credit rate for all renewable resource facilities).
